turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi I want to order coffee please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks in Guerneville CA

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh.. can you confirm they are open? there is a major flood there and some businesses are closed?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can check. Hold a moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.. thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they are open today until 6:30 p.m.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.. I want 2 iced coffees and 1 frappachino please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.. what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want tall on the Iced coffees and the regular size on Frappachino

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.. got it, anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want a blueberry muffin.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.. I'll add that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, can you tell me when it will be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready in 15 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.. can I get honey and whipped cream added on the frapachino?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I'll add it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome good bye.
